flavor: “Knowledge is power. And you have much to learn.”
name: Mantis
text: Empathetic Advantage — Resource: Discard a confused status card from an enemy or character you control → generate a [mental] resource. (Generate [wild][mental] resources instead if you discarded a confused status card from an enemy. Limit once per round.)

name: Mantis
text: [star] Empathic Leveling — Response: After you use your REC, confuse a character you control. “This one lives to illuminate.”

name: Drax
text: Drax cannot attack minions. [star] While Drax is confused, add his THW to his ATK and his basic attacks gain piercing and ignore the guard keyword. “Give me something worthwhile to do.” —Drax

name: Precognition
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme. Search the top 3 cards of your deck for a card and add it to your hand. If it is a Mantis card, remove 1 threat from a scheme. “A welcome and a warning in a single breath.” —Mantis

name: Pressure Point Strike
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. If that enemy is confused, you may either deal 1 additional damage to that enemy, or discard a confused status card from that enemy to draw 1 card.

name: Psychic Feat
text: Hero Action: Confuse a character you control. Then, confuse an enemy. “No! Get out of my head!” “This one is the Celestial Madonna. I go where I wish.”

flavor: “She can do that? And she tells us now?” —Bug
name: Biopathy
text: Response: After you spend this card, heal 1 damage from a friendly character. You may confuse a character you control to draw 1 card.

name: Meditation Atrium
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Meditation Atrium → search the top 3 cards of your deck for a card and add it to your hand. If it is a Mantis card, heal 1 damage from a friendly character. Shuffle your deck.

name: Fortified Mind
text: Attach to an ally. Limit 1 per ally. Interrupt: When attached ally attacks or thwarts, discard Fortified Mind → that ally gets +1 THW and +1 ATK and takes no consequential damage for this activation. Then, confuse that ally.

name: Psionic Mindlock
text: Attach to an enemy. If attached enemy has stalwart, it loses stalwart and gains steady. Hero Response: After attached enemy activates, discard Psionic Mindlock → deal 3 damage to that enemy and confuse it.

name: The Celestial Madonna
text: Hero Resource: Exhaust The Celestial Madonna → Use Mantis’ “Empathetic Advantage” ability. This use does not count against that ability‘s limit. “She’s trained since birth by priests from another world to represent all of humanity.” —Thor
